relation: Question
What does the egg look like?
How can I tell what Generation I'm buying/bought?
What are the Characters?
What are the Characters names?
What are the differences in the game between the two generations?
What about Tamagotchi food?
Any different icons?
When my Tamagotchi has died or gone home what will be displayed last on the screen?
Gen1/P1 Answer
Gen1/P1: Box has purple edges Pictures Gen1 Characters on back Pic of Tama with 'Meal Snack' on the screen Has Kuchipatchi sticker on package Doesn't have 'Tamagotchi' writen on the top of the egg
Gen1 Chart

Gen1: From hatch to adult in order of best to worst (same order as chart; t-b): Egg Babitchi Marutchi Tamatchi Kuchitamatchi Mametchi Ginjirotchi Masukutchi/Masktchi Kuchipatchi Nyorotchi Tarakotchi Bill (Secret Character)

Gen1 game is a guessing game. You try to guess which way your character is going to look by pressing the far left or middle button. The far left button is guessing left the middle button is guessing he'll turn right. Getting 3 v 2 and up will make you the winner and fill an empty heart on happy and the Tama will lose 1 oz if it is above the minimum weight. If you don't win, the empty heart will remain empty and the Tama will still lose 1 oz.
They eat bread or a peice of candy. Food screen has the words "Meal" and "Snack" when selecting.
Has a needle for the medication icon.
Gen2/P2 Answer
Gen2/P2: Box has blue edges Pictures Gen2 Characters on back Pic of Tama with 'Happy w/ hearts' on the screen Has Hashizotchi sticker on package Usually has 'Tamagotchi' writen on the top of the egg
Gen2 Chart

Gen2: From hatch to adult in order of best to worst (same order as chart; t-b): Egg Shirobabitchi Tonmarutchi Tongaritchi Hashitamatchi Mimitchi Pochitchi Zukitchi Hashizotchi Takotchi Kusatchi Zachi (Secret Character)

Gen2 game is a number game. You try to guess rather the number your Tama is thinking of is lower or higher then the number displayed. If it's a '9' press the far left button to choose lower. If it's a '1' press the middle button to choose higher. Getting 3 v 2 or higher will win you the game and fill one empty heart on happy and the Tama will loose 1 lb if it is above the minimum weight. If you don't win the game the empty heart will remain empty and the Tama will still lose 1 lb.
They eat a hamburger or a peice of cake. Food selection shows the actual food on the screen.
Has a spoon and bottle for medication icon.
